Authors: Yingming Li, Lei Cai, Roger G Shivas
Title:
Three new species of Tilletia (Ustilaginomycetes) on Eriachne
(Poaceae) in northern Australia
Keywords:
Eriachneae, Phylogeny, Smut fungi, Systematics,
Taxonomy
Abstract:
Three new species of Tilletia are described from species
of Eriachne (Poaceae) in the arid tropics of north-western Australia.
Tilletia marjanae sp. nov. infects Eriachne pulchella subsp. dominii in
Western Australia and the Northern Territory. In Western Australia,
Tilletia mactaggartii sp. nov. infects Eriachne festucacea, and Tilletia
geeringii sp. nov. infects Eriachne sulcata. These three species are the
first records of Tilletia spp. on Eriachne.
